#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int n,X;
		cin>>n>>X;
		int a,b[n];
		int flag=0;
		int min=-INT_MAX;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a;
			b[i]=a-X;
			if(b[i]>0){flag=1;}
		}
		if(flag==0){cout<<"0\n";}
		if(flag==1){
		long long int sum=0,sum1=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sum1+=b[i];
			if(sum1<0){sum1=0;}
			if(sum<=sum1){sum=sum1;}
		}
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
		}
	}
}
